content: chain-1 space double_crochet in next 20dc* repeat from *4 times more double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 16dc turn body part instructions are for size 6-12 months changes for size 12-24 months are in … row 1 ch1 single_crochet in each of next 16 17 double_crochet ch5 skip ch1 and next 28 30 double_crochet single_crochet in each of next 46 52 sts here ch1 counts as a stitch too and you have to work single_crochet in it ch5 skip next 28 30 double_crochet and ch1 single_crochet in next 16 17 double_crochet turn row 2 ch1 *single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st* repeat from* to end turn 88 96 sts repeat row 2 till the cardigan is 30cm/12in 33cm/13in long don t fasten_off but work single_crochet evenly around the front and collar fasten_off 3 www monpetitviolon etsy com
